author: schor
msg: No Jira - prepare for FOP 0.93. Added roles calling out "html"
or "fo" (PDF) for all <imageobject> tags.  For "html" - left
the width spec as originally specified, in pixels.  For "fo", changed
the width spec to absolute size (5.5in - the running body
text width).  This has no effect for FOP 0.20.5, but does
